name: Memoirs of Murder: Welcome to Hidden Pines Collector's Edition
name_original: Memoirs of Murder: Welcome to Hidden Pines Collector's Edition
description:
Memoirs of Murder: Welcome to Hidden Pines Collector's Edition is a casual adventure game developed by Eipix Entertainment. It came out on 05-05-2018. It was published by Big Fish Games. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Memoirs of Murder: Welcome to Hidden Pines Collector's Edition is available on PC.
